free: #c 這是他的家，月亮是他的照明。我想應該是照明吧。
#e This is his home. There exists the moon which is his lighting. I think it must be the lighting.
#n misee的本意是說的意思。但這裡表示說話人在想，「我覺得，我想應該是」的意思

free: #c 曾經掉入水缸的（青蛙），要出去。

#n arapapining 就是 arapipining

#n sikaru 裡面
#n pupunga 更小的容器

#e That child woke up and looked around.

gloss: 變成-重疊-外頭-祈使.主焦
free: #c 在樹上，呃，在樹根那裡的地面上，兩個一起在那裡呼叫，青蛙，你在哪裡，青蛙，出來啊！
#e The stay in the tree, uh... at the tree, calling “Frog~~ where are you, frog, come on out.”
#n po-kari 呼叫，malisusuna 呼喊（沒目的，就純發聲）
#n 孔老師覺得最完整的說法，應該是 arapipiningi-a 出來！

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #n cʉ’ʉre 他看 cʉ’ʉrʉnʉ kee 的連音； =nia 就是 ‘inia
#n cʉ’ʉre 他看 cʉ’ʉrʉnʉ kee 的連音； =nia 就是 ‘inia

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #c 他看著這顆樹，啊，有個洞。
#e He looked at this tree. There is a hole.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #c 有個洞，啊呀！原來有個蜂窩掛在樹這裡！
#e There is a hole. Oh! So there is a beehive suspended here in the tree!
#n anu 可以是蜜蜂或蜂蜜，也可以是蜂窩
#n te=ku tumatatini tikuru 我要掛衣服；詞根 tini

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #c 這兩個人待在那裡。
#e These two stayed there.
#n mon=inia 是 mon 'inia 的連音

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #c 拿那個蜂窩，小狗掉到池塘裡面。
#e Holding that beehive, the dog dropped into the pool.
#n ia應該是 isa

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #n ni-matapari掉落，但是後面的i掉了
#n ni-matapari掉落，但是後面的i掉了

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #c 那個狗掉到池塘裡面。
#e That dog dropped into the pool

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #n ’esi pa ’inia 那裡還有
#n ia 是 isa
#n ’esi pa ’inia 那裡還有
#n ia 是 isa

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #c 那隻小狗還在那邊掙扎，想要抓那個蜂窩。
#e That dog was still struggling and wanted to grasp the beehive.
#n asa 是布農語

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #c 小孩在地上睡覺，小孩可能怕蜜蜂吧。
#e The kid slept on the floor. It appeared that he felt fear about bees.
#n misee 的本意是說，但是這邊是表示「以為」的意思，內心的想法
#n nivatu pani misee 我以為Pani來了

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #n asa是布農語，想要的意思
#n makasi 某人說，makasia這樣， makasua那樣
#n Kanakanavu 沒有「想要」這個字，孔老師表示他說不出來
#n asa是布農語，想要的意思
#n makasi 某人說，makasia這樣， makasua那樣
#n Kanakanavu 沒有「想要」這個字，孔老師表示他說不出來

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #c 之後他想爬上去和小狗待在那裡呼喊。
#e Then the child wanted to come climbing up and stayed there, and then called with the dog.
#n mo=nia 是 mon ’inia 的簡略
#n 這裡的ia比較像iha，是個人習慣的isa的發音

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #c 那個青蛙出現在水上。
#e That frog emerged from the water.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #c 那個小孩嚇了一跳，他摀著他的嘴巴。
#e The kid was surprised, and he put his hands to his mouse.
#n ivici 嘴巴

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #n urume孔老師不知道是什麼，上一句也是。
#n urume孔老師不知道是什麼，上一句也是。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #c He was surprised that so there are bees here!
#e 他嚇了一跳，原來這裡有蜜蜂啊！
#n tu 是布農語
#n AVA 表示一種意料之外的語氣 sa’o’o-ava 原來這麼好吃啊
#n 類似的還有ANA，表示「非常」 sa’o’o-ana 真好吃

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #n 孔老師的感覺這句話應該是想說，mon=cu na ’inia，待在那裡
#n 孔老師的感覺這句話應該是想說，mon=cu na ’inia，待在那裡

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #c 他的小狗不怕，待在那裡，就待在那裡了，（他）大叫這裡原來有老鼠，這個狗看到了。
#e His dog did not feel affraid and stayed there. Just stayed there. He shouted out that there was a mouse so! The dog saw it.
#n cumacʉ’ʉra 看，cini’ʉra 看到了，變成cʉnra

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #c 好像是那個小孩往這裡走，又走去枯樹那裡。
#e It appealed that the child came here and went over the withered tree.
#n mosa 就是 mo-kusa
#n ne 是 nesi
#n maringuna 是乾的意思，用在樹的話是枯的意思

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e  He went to see that hole whether his frog was inside there or not.
#c  去看那個樹洞他養的那隻青蛙有沒有在裡面。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e There was not.
#c 沒有。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e The frog was not there. The kid kept saying ‘where did my frog go?’
#c 青蛙不在，小孩一直在那個地方一直叫他養的青蛙到底去哪裡?

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e The kid was shocked by the coming out of the owl.
#c 那個貓頭鷹出來了，小朋友嚇了一跳。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e The owl came out from the hole. It came from the hole to the outside.
#c 那個貓頭鷹出來，那個小朋友嚇了一跳就跌下來，狗也驚怕到就跑走了。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e The child fell down to the earth. It is pitiful of him.
#c 那小孩從那個樹跌下來 很可憐。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e His doggy ran away.
#c 他的小狗逃走了。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e The doggy ran away because it was being chased by a swarm of bees.
#c 後來，狗在跑的時候，原來一群蜜蜂就跟著他在追他。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e He kept calling that dog, and that owl came out.
#c 他後來一直叫（但那隻狗沒有回應），然後貓頭鷹就出來。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e Then the kid climbed a tree… oh a stone.
#c 後來小朋友就爬到樹上…阿不是拉，是石頭上。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e But, it’s not a tree. It’s a deer.
#c 原來不是，是鹿。
#n ka 幫助這句話表達更明確

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e He doesn’t know that the deer was still there.
#c 他不知道那個鹿還在那裡。
#n 小男孩自以為說那棵很多樹枝的是樹。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e He thought that was a tree, and he stood above the stone.
#c 他認為說旁邊那顆是樹，他在石頭上。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e Therefore, the dog was on the ground, scared very much.
#c 就這樣 小狗在地上，一直在怕。
#e He was waiting his dog.
#c 他在等他的小狗。
#n ’esi = e

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e When it came to this moment, the boy was still standing above the stone, he didn’t know that was a deer.
#c 事情來到這個時候  他還在爬到石頭上 他不知道原來是鹿。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e Then, the kid kept calling his dog.
#c 就這樣，到這裡。他一直叫他的狗。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e The dog was barking at that dog for his mounting the deer.
#c 狗在叫那小孩子爬到鹿的上面。
#n 小狗在叫他的主人爬到鹿的上面。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e It fell on the ground, where was the edge of water. The deer came out.
#c 跌在地上 原來是水的邊緣，然後鹿就來。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e Then, the deer ran to the edge of the water. It seemed like that the deer wanted to ran away.
#c 就這樣，這個鹿跑到邊緣，他以為鹿像是要跑掉。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e The kid understood this was a deer!
#c 小孩知道了 這個原來是鹿。
#e As he found that wasn’t a bushy tree, he and his doggy was stunned and fell on the ground from the antlers and the slope.
#c 在他發覺不是樹的時候，小朋友和他的小狗就唉唷，從鹿角和斜坡跌到地上。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e Then, both of the kid and the doggy were really afraid. They were crying .
#c 這個時候，狗跟那個小朋友一直在害怕,然後他們就一直叫。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e They fell on a pool of water.
#c 他們掉在這個水上。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e (They) therefore fell into the water.
#c 掉到水中，就這樣子在水中。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e The dog climbed to the boy and very scared.
#c 後來小狗因為怕，爬到小朋友頭上。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e The dog was scared due to falling into the water.
#c 狗因為掉進水裡面，所以就怕。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e At the time, the boy kept calling the frog, saying ‘frog, where are you?’
#c 這個時候，小主人就一直叫：「我的青蛙我的青蛙你在哪裡？」

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e There was a dried tree, inside which there was a hole.
#c 有一個乾的樹，樹裡有一個洞。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e His dog was swimming in the water searching his frog.
#c 他的小狗在水裡游泳，尋找他的青蛙。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e He and his dog entered the tree hole.
#c 他自己跟他的小狗在這裡，叫小狗進到樹洞裡。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e Both they said, ‘Frog, frog where are you?’
#c 兩個一直同時說：「青蛙青蛙你在哪裡?」

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e They were keeping searching the frog around the tree.
#c 他們沿著樹的周邊一直在找。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e The doggy and the boy climbed the dried tree saying, ‘where are you frog? Come out, please!’
#c 後來狗跟小孩爬到乾樹上說：「青蛙青蛙你在哪？請你出來。」

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e The frog didn’t come out for some time. They were shocked when the frog suddenly appeared.
#c 這青蛙一直沒有出來。牠一出來的時候他們嚇了一跳。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e The kid and the doggy found that the frog had been walking with another frog!
#c 小孩和小狗看見青蛙原來兩隻在一起。
#n Manu isi mata tamtitu tarakusa na  takarura is-eva mecocua sua takarura.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e It was because that his lost frog had found his frog lover.
#c 原來他失蹤了這個青蛙找到他的愛人。
#n ni-mʉtʉa karʉen 失蹤的愛人

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e Oops, so many lovers were seen by the boy and his doggy who were happy standing on the rock.
#c 真的，原來這個青蛙在離開我們的時候，認識了很多他的朋友，兩位很高興地站在石頭上。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e He saw his frog. Our frog had found its lover!
#c 他看到他們青蛙，原來我們的青蛙找到了他的愛人!

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e The lover it found was also a frog.
#c 他找的愛人也是青蛙。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e The frog was getting along with other frogs well. It seemed not to see its master and the dog, because it had found many other good friends.
#c 青蛙們一起在走。他似乎不認識了他的小主人和狗，因為他找到了很多的朋友彼此都很友好。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e  ‘The frog would not like to go home,’ the kid and the doggy thought.
#c 小主人跟小狗這樣想：「這個青蛙不想回家。」

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

gloss: 主焦-走=改變狀態=1PL.主格.排除

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e Let’s go, frog. It’s ok that your lover stay here.
#c 青蛙，我們回家。你的朋友待在這裡沒關係的。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

free: #e Then, they just thanked his frog’s lover.
#c 就這樣，他們就說謝謝。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 孔金治, Uva Kapanena, male, 1951
